changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `documents` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date_create` datetime NOT NULL, `date_doc` datetime NOT NULL, `sum` double(18,2) NOT NULL, `supplier` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `doc_html` text, `header` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `is_done` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `autor_id` int NOT NULL, `user_id_last_change` int NOT NULL, `date_last_edit` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `documents_FK` (`autor_id`), KEY `documents_FK_1` (`user_id_last_change`), CONSTRAINT `documents_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`autor_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `documents_FK_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id_last_change`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3;
